EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-05-17 APM Survey.ES 1 - Marketo.ES 1 - HTML Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 for 3 Minute Survey | Assure Application Performance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/2HlFMO5]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Answer this 3-Minute Survey on Assuring Application Performance <[[http://bit.ly/2HlFMO5]]> to help us better understand how your IT organization is tackling performance issues today so that we can share best practices that will address your most pressing challenges in the future.
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/2HlFMO5]]>
To say thanks, you will earn a $10 Amazon Gift Card upon completion of the survey. Furthermore, we are offering a $50 Amazon Gift Card for agreeing to a 30-minute meeting to learn how Turbonomic can help you assure application performance. Regards, Elizabeth
